form.name: Better Body Fitness: New Hire Form
form.description: new hire form for better body fitness of montana

fields.name: Contact requesting new hire (First and Last name)
fields.description:
Input your name here to indicate who is requesting the new hire. New hires and terminations are limited to **Authorized** personnel. Input your first and Last name so we can confirm you are authorized to make the request.
*Example: John Doe*

fields.name: Submission Date
fields.description: Enter today's date for the New User Request

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The day the New Hire will be starting

fields.name: Name (first, middle initial, and last name)
fields.description:
Type the first-name, middle-initial, and last-name of the new hire. Be sure to confirm spelling. A Full middle name is acceptable. This is a required field. 
*Example: Will B Smith*

fields.name: Is an E-Mail address requested?
fields.description: Will the new hire require an email address as part of this request? This is a required field.

fields.name: Email Address format
fields.description:
Type the actual email address requested. The best practice is to utilize the first initial and last name as the email. This is a required field.
*Example: wsmith@test.com*

fields.name: What teams group are they apart of
Copy Existing Employee?
fields.description: If there is an existing employee that has the same drive mapping and email distribution groups we can copy this user for the new user.

fields.name: Enter the name of the Employee
fields.description: This is the user we will copy for the new employee.

fields.name: Enter the name of the permissions
fields.description: This is where you put the exact permissions needed on a user as we are not copying them

fields.name: phone number
fields.description: cell phone\desk number so we can call the user when they submit a ticket

fields.name: Position Title
fields.description: Enter the Position or Title of the employee.

fields.name: Additional Hardware (if applicable)
fields.description: Is there any additional hardware that is needed beside the above hardware setup.

fields.name: Hardware needed
fields.description: Please tell us what a hardware the user is going to need in addition to what they have

fields.name: Any additional software required
fields.description: select yes if any specific software needs to be prepared or installed for the new user.

fields.name: List software requirements
fields.description: List software that will need to installed
